items.sentence: Leaving Boston was the biggest mistake I ever made.
I have a gut feeling that Tom won\'t pass the test.
I can\'t walk fast, but I can walk for a long time.
I couldn\'t think of a good place to hide my money.
I didn\'t even know that Tom was born in Australia.
If Tom hadn\'t rescued Mary, she would\'ve drowned.
How many of the words on this list do you not know?
How much longer are you planning to stay in Boston?
How was Tom able to lose so much weight so quickly?
I almost told Tom what you told me not to tell him.
Tom lay awake almost all night thinking about Mary.
Tom looked really happy when Mary entered the room.
Tom went to Boston to stay with one of his cousins.
Tom wondered where Mary was and what she was doing.
Tom, Mary, John, Alice and I used to sing together.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all going to do that.
It took a long time to take in what she was saying.
It was careless of you to leave the key in the car.
It was difficult for us to decide which one to buy.
Tom is looking at the pictures Mary took in Boston.
Tom is looking for a cheap place to live in Boston.
Tom is more dangerous than we first thought he was.
Tom is moving out of town at the end of this month.
Tom is much shorter and weighs much less than Mary.
Everyone stopped talking when Tom entered the room.
Everything happened the way Tom predicted it would.
French is the language that I speak the most often.
French is the only foreign language that Tom knows.
You should never put on makeup while driving a car.
It\'s almost impossible to read Tom\'s handwriting.
I found it necessary to get up early every morning.
I found the diary that my father kept for 30 years.
I got a rash on my hands from dishwasher detergent.
I guess you heard about what happened this morning.
Tom doesn\'t think that Mary looks like her mother.
Tom lied to Mary when he said he didn\'t know John.
Some of the passengers weren\'t wearing seat belts.
You need to be careful not to hurt Tom\'s feelings.
You ought to tell Tom you aren\'t planning to swim.
You really want to move back to Boston, don\'t you?
Tom\'s disappearance completely baffled the police.
Tom\'s health has been deteriorating for some time.
Tom\'s operation was going to cost a small fortune.
I haven\'t found a way to stop Tom from doing that.
Don\'t force Tom to do that if he doesn\'t want to.
Don\'t force yourself to eat if you don\'t want to.
How many hours a day does she spend in the kitchen?
Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t planning on doing that?
Tom heard a strange sound coming from the basement.
Tom intends to live in Boston for more than a year.
